data.title: Python小爬虫——网页pdf文档批量下载
data.excerpt: 最近在看MIT的算法课，需要看当堂的notes、assignment还有solution。但是本人实在是懒得不行的那种人，不想一个一个点着下载在整理，再加上早听说过原来就有ICS的大佬自己写过爬虫的东西。于是想试试python的乞丐版爬虫，实践一把，算是强行给自己加戏吧，写个脚本，连工程都谈不上。
data.link: post/Python小爬虫——网页pdf文档批量下载

data.title: A guide for Hexo and Github pages
data.excerpt:
“Remember that the faith that moves mountains always carries a pick.” — Mark Twin

This is the first post written in this blog which mainly recorded the construction of environment to use hexo. Following links can be good guide for use and understand.

data.title: Hello World
data.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
